title: Sara Ali Khan Shares Ab-Baring Pictures Of Brother Ibrahim, Says He Looks Like Saif's Xerox!
text:
Sara Ali Khan Shares Ab-Baring Pictures Of Brother Ibrahim, Says He Looks Like Saif's Xerox!

Sara Ali Khan Shares Ab-Baring Pictures Of Brother Ibrahim, Says He Looks Like Saif's Xerox!

Actor Sara Ali Khan took to Instagram to share pictures of her brother Ibrahim Ali Khan. Ibrahim did a photo shoot for designers Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla and the pictures look straight out of a fashion catalogue.

The monochrome pictures shared by Sara shows Ibrahim posing as he flaunts his matching jacket, striped pants, and shoes. Fans flooded these pictures with comments.

While many compared Ibrahim to his dad Saif Ali Khan, many commented that he is Bollywood ready!



The Pataudi siblings - Sara and Ibrahim Ali Khan also shot for a magazine cover together.

Don't Miss 34.3 K SHARES 26.5 K SHARES 9.3 K SHARES 8 K SHARES 4.3 K SHARES

The festive issue featured the two flaunting elegant co-ordinated outfits where the 'Kedarnath' debutant is draped in a black net sari paired with an asymmetrical colourful shiny blouse. Meanwhile, her brother was seen wearing a black jacket-style ensemble with a multicolored pair of pants. Sharing the cover on their official Instagram handle, the magazine captioned,

"First time ever: Siblings Sara Ali Khan and Ibrahim Ali Khan play muse to Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla in our festive issue and talk about their bond, legacy and life ahead."

While talking to the magazine, Ibrahim opened up about his rapport with his elder sister. He said,

“The relationship we share is just perfect – we rarely fight and that’s perhaps because we have a five-year gap between us. On occasions that we do, it’s over the stupidest things. We are very close and love each other a lot."

On the work front, the 24-year old is shooting for her next 'Coolie No. 1' with Varun Dhawan. It is the remake of Govinda and Karisma Kapoor starrer film of the same name with both being directed by Varun's father and filmmaker David Dhawan. The upcoming feature will be produced by Vashu Bhagnani, who also bankrolled the 1995 classic.
description: The monochrome pictures shared by Sara shows Ibrahim posing as he flaunts his matching jacket, striped pants, and shoes. Fans flooded these pictures with comments. Actor Sara Ali Khan took to Instagram to share pictures of her brother Ibrahim Ali Khan. Ibrahim did a photo shoot for designers Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla and the pictures look straight out of a fashion catalogue.
